channel.title: Missing Textures/Unistal Name
channel.description: My Black Mesa is missing some textures and replacing them with purple and black squares (Human eyes, radioactive goop, and underwater) and so I want to uninstal and reinstal my copy in hopes of fixing this. Problem is I can find it under the uninstall programs list, what is it called for this list? Many thanks to anyone who helps me with this problem, because I really want to finish this amazing game^_^

item.title: Missing Textures/Unistal Name
item.dc:creator: TriforceCollector
item.description:
Conti:

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14947

Thanks! Still can’t find the \Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS file though. I’ve looked under computer and the uninstal list, yet I cant find it. Do you know where I’m supposed to be looking for this if I’m looking in the wrong places? Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Textures/Unistal Name
item.dc:creator: TriforceCollector
item.description:
My Black Mesa is missing some textures and replacing them with purple and black squares (Human eyes, radioactive goop, and underwater) and so I want to uninstal and reinstal my copy in hopes of fixing this. Problem is I can find it under the uninstall programs list, what is it called for this list? Many thanks to anyone who helps me with this problem, because I really want to finish this amazing game^_^
